title: Mithali Raj and Jhulan Goswami: A Heartfelt Farewell to Legends
content:
Mithali Raj and Jhulan Goswami, the pillars of Indian women's cricket, have bid farewell to the World Cup stage. Their exit, marked by India's heartbreaking loss to South Africa, evokes a mix of emotions â€“  disappointment, respect, and a sense of gratitude. 

Despite the loss, their composure and grace in defeat were remarkable. The pair, who have weathered countless storms in their careers, embodied the spirit of true sportsmanship. They have left behind a legacy of grit, determination, and a profound impact on the game. 

Their journey, spanning over two decades, has paved the way for a brighter future for women's cricket in India. The current generation of players owe their success to the foundation laid by Mithali and Jhulan. Their departure marks the end of an era, but their contributions will continue to inspire generations to come.
author: Ananya Upendran
